The§2 Primitive Blast Furnace§f is one of the main goals in this Age and is an important step getting towards §eAge 1 - Low Voltage§f!

With either some §2Coal§f, §2Coke§f or §2Charcoal§f and §2Iron §for §2Wrought Iron§f§f you will be finally able to get some §2Steel§f!§2 Wrought Iron§f will process faster into§2 Steel§f than normal §2Iron§f.
